channel.title: SMF 74 Subtype 8 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 74 Subtype 8 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - _8al
item.description: Length of Rank Array data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748AL

item.title: Field - _8an
item.description: Number of Rank Array data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748AN

item.title: Field - _8ao
item.description: Offset to Rank Array data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748AO

item.title: Field - _8cl
item.description: Length of link control section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748CL

item.title: Field - _8cn
item.description: Number of link control sections Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748CN

item.title: Field - _8co
item.description: Offset to link control section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748CO

item.title: Field - _8ll
item.description: Length of link data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748LL

item.title: Field - _8ln
item.description: Number of link data sections Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748LN

item.title: Field - _8lo
item.description: Offset to link data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748LO

item.title: Field - _8rl
item.description: Length of Rank statistics data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748RL

item.title: Field - _8rn
item.description: Number of Rank statistics data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748RN

item.title: Field - _8ro
item.description: Offset to Rank statistics data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748RO

item.title: Field - _8sl
item.description: Length of Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect. Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748SL

item.title: Field - _8sn
item.description: Number of Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect. Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748SN

item.title: Field - _8so
item.description: Offset to Synchronous I/O Link Statistics data sect. Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748SO

item.title: Field - _8xl
item.description: Length of Extent pool data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748XL

item.title: Field - _8xn
item.description: Number of Extent pool data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748XN

item.title: Field - _8xo
item.description: Offset to Extent pool data section Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF748XO

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process, Default: Unknown Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length 000TTTTF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74CYC

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start: 00YYDDDF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74DAT

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74DTE

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74FLA Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. rch 5 SMF record converted to higher release or service level.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74FLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time (STCK format) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74GIE

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IET

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IML Description X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval: MMSSTTTF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74INT

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: TOD monitor interval start: 0HHMMSSF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74IST

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74LEN Description ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74LGO

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number in packed decimal format: nnnF Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MFV

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74MVS

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74OIL

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRD

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PRF Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74PRL

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74PRN

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74PRS

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74PTN

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF74PRO Based on: prf Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - r748aacp
item.description: Array capacity in GB Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AACP

item.title: Field - r748aaid
item.description: Rank array identifier Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AAID

item.title: Field - r748aasp
item.description: Array speed in 1000 RPM Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AASP

item.title: Field - r748aast
item.description: Array device class and Array status Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AAST

item.title: Field - r748aawd
item.description: Array width Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AAWD

item.title: Field - r748adc
item.description: Array device class 00 = Enterprise 01 = Near-line 10 = SATA 11 = Solid state drive Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748ADC Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748ard 2 ‘1’ = Raid degraded r748adt 3 ‘1’ = DDM throttling r748are 4 ‘1’ = RPM exception

item.title: Field - r748adt
item.description: ‘1’ = DDM throttling Map: R748ARRY Based on: r748adc Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r748adc.

item.title: Field - r748aebc
item.description: Array type in EBCDIC Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748AEBC

item.title: Field - r748ard
item.description: ‘1’ = Raid degraded Map: R748ARRY Based on: r748adc Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r748adc.

item.title: Field - r748are
item.description: ‘1’ = RPM exception Map: R748ARRY Based on: r748adc Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r748adc.

item.title: Field - r748arid
item.description: Rank identfier Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748ARID

item.title: Field - r748atyp
item.description: Array type 01 = RAID-5, 02 = RAID-10, 03 = RAID-6, 04-FF Not used Map: R748ARRY Based on: R748ATYP

item.title: Field - r748cae
item.description: Abend Code (SDWACMPC) System and User completion code (12 bits each) Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CAE

item.title: Field - r748cdev
item.description: Device number of device that statistics where read from Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CDEV

item.title: Field - r748cfci
item.description: Interval length of first record (Reserved for duration processing) Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFCI

item.title: Field - r748cfdt
item.description: Date when first record was written (Reserved for duration processing) Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFDT

item.title: Field - r748cfdv
item.description: Failing device Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFDV

item.title: Field - r748cflg
item.description: Flags Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748cxvl 0 Extent Pool statistics valid

item.title: Field - r748cfsc
item.description: Subchannel set ID of failing device Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFSC

item.title: Field - r748cftm
item.description: Time when first record was written (Reserved for duration processing) Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CFTM

item.title: Field - r748cint
item.description: Number of seconds since statistics last collected Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CINT

item.title: Field - r748cioc
item.description: IOS return code. Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CIOC Description If not zero, no link statistic data sections

item.title: Field - r748clvl
item.description: Gatherer level Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CLVL

item.title: Field - r748cmdl
item.description: CU MoDeL Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CMDL

item.title: Field - r748crtn
item.description: IDCSS01 return code Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CRTN

item.title: Field - r748csc
item.description: Status code 00 = successful processed, 04 = IOS return code R748CIOC ^= 0, 08 = IDCSS01 return code R748CRTN ^= 0, 98 = SYSTEM or USER ABEND R748CAE ^= 0 Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CSC

item.title: Field - r748cscs
item.description: ID of the subchannel set which is physically configured to the device from which statistics are measured Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CSCS

item.title: Field - r748cser
item.description: Primary CU serial number Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CSER

item.title: Field - r748ctyp
item.description: CU TYPe Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CTYP

item.title: Field - r748cvol
item.description: Volume serial of device that statistics where read from Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CVOL

item.title: Field - r748cvsn
item.description: VerSioN of link statistics definition 00 = Original length of link statistics 01 = Link statistics extended 02 = Link statistics V2 format Map: R748CNTL Based on: R748CVSN

item.title: Field - r748cxvl
item.description: Extent Pool statistics valid Map: R748CNTL Based on: r748cflg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748cflg.

item.title: Field - r748laid
item.description: Adapter ID Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LAID

item.title: Field - r748lbyt
item.description: On = Units of bytes indeterminable. Map: R748LSS Based on: r748lflg Description Byte values incorrect. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748lflg.

item.title: Field - r748lerb
item.description: ECKD architecture Read in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LERB

item.title: Field - r748lero
item.description: ECKD architecture Read Operations. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LERO Description For ESCON ports, one count per chain which transfers customer data to the host. For FICON ports, one count per command which transfers customer data to the host (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lert
item.description: ECKD architecture Read accumulated time on channel in milliseconds. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LERT Description The active processing time for each command is accumulated (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lewb
item.description: ECKD architecture Write units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LEWB

item.title: Field - r748lewo
item.description: ECKD architecture Write Operations. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LEWO Description For ESCON ports, one count per chain which transfers customer data from the host. For FICON ports, one count per command which transfers customer data from the host (long floating point). Note: A chain on an ESCON port that has read and write commands is counted as a read chain.

item.title: Field - r748lewt
item.description: ECKD architecture Write accumulated time on channel in milliseconds. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LEWT Description The active processing time for each command is accumulated (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lfbc
item.description: Fibre Channel bit error rate Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFBC

item.title: Field - r748lfcr
item.description: Fibre Channel cyclic redundancy check (CRC) errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFCR

item.title: Field - r748lfdf
item.description: Fibre Channel duplicate frame errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFDF

item.title: Field - r748lfif
item.description: Fibre Channel illegal frame errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFIF

item.title: Field - r748lfio
item.description: Fibre Channel invalid relative offset failures (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFIO

item.title: Field - r748lfit
item.description: Fibre Channel invalid transmission word errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFIT

item.title: Field - r748lflf
item.description: Fibre Channel link failures (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFLF

item.title: Field - r748lflg
item.description: Flags Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748lbyt 0 On = Units of bytes indeterminable. r748ltim 1 On = Units of time indeterminable.

item.title: Field - r748lfls
item.description: Fibre Channel signal failures (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFLS

item.title: Field - r748lfly
item.description: Fibre Channel synchronization failures (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFLY

item.title: Field - r748lfoa
item.description: Fibre Channel out of order ACK errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFOA

item.title: Field - r748lfod
item.description: Fibre Channel out of order data errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFOD

item.title: Field - r748lfpq
item.description: Number of Fibre Channel primitive sequnece errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFPQ

item.title: Field - r748lfr1
item.description: Fibre Channel link recovery (LR) sent (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFR1

item.title: Field - r748lfr2
item.description: Fibre Channel link recovery (LR) received (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFR2

item.title: Field - r748lftc
item.description: Fibre Channel sequence timeout errors (short floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LFTC

item.title: Field - r748lprb
item.description: PPRC Received in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPRB

item.title: Field - r748lpro
item.description: PPRC Received Operations. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPRO Description Each PPRC write command received by the PPRC secondary (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lprt
item.description: PPRC Received accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPRT

item.title: Field - r748lpsb
item.description: PPRC Sent in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPSB

item.title: Field - r748lpso
item.description: PPRC Sent Operations. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPSO Description Each PPRC write command sent by the PPRC primary (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lpst
item.description: PPRC Sent accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LPST

item.title: Field - r748lsrb
item.description: SCSI Read in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSRB

item.title: Field - r748lsro
item.description: SCSI Read Operations. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSRO Description Each customer read operation is counted (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lsrt
item.description: SCSI Read accumulated time on channel in milliseconds (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSRT

item.title: Field - r748lswb
item.description: SCSI Write in units of 128K bytes (long floating point) Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSWB

item.title: Field - r748lswo
item.description: SCSI Write Operations. Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSWO Description Each customer write operation is counted (long floating point).

item.title: Field - r748lswt
item.description: SCSI Write accumulated time on channel in milliseconds (long floating point). Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LSWT

item.title: Field - r748ltim
item.description: On = Units of time indeterminable. Map: R748LSS Based on: r748lflg Description Time values incorrect. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r748lflg.

item.title: Field - r748ltyp
item.description: Link type 1 ESCON 2 Fibre Channel 1 Gb/s 3 Fibre Channel 2 Gb/s 4 Fibre Channel 4 Gb/s 5 Fibre Channel 8 Gb/s 6 Fibre Channel 16 Gb/s 10 Ethernet Channel 10 Gb/s Map: R748LSS Based on: R748LTYP

item.title: Field - r748rai
item.description: Rank adapter pair id Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RAI

item.title: Field - r748raiv
item.description: ‘1’ = Rank adapter pair id valid Map: R748RANK Based on: r748rtq Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r748rtq.

item.title: Field - r748raix
item.description: Index to first array section of rank Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RAIX

item.title: Field - r748rbyr
item.description: Rank 128 KBYtes read. Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RBYR Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rbyw
item.description: Rank 128 KBYtes write. Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RBYW Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rcnt
item.description: Count of arrays in rank Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RCNT

item.title: Field - r748rkrt
item.description: Rank read response time in units of 16 milliseconds. Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RKRT Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rkwt
item.description: Rank write response time in units of 16 milliseconds. Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RKWT Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rpnm
item.description: Extent pool number Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RPNM

item.title: Field - r748rrid
item.description: Rank identifier Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RRID

item.title: Field - r748rrop
item.description: Rank read operations. Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RROP Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748rtcr
item.description: ‘1’ = Data encrypted rank Map: R748RANK Based on: r748rtq Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748rtq.

item.title: Field - r748rtq
item.description: Rank type qualifer Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RTQ Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748rtcr 0 ‘1’ = Data encrypted rank r748raiv 7 ‘1’ = Rank adapter pair id valid

item.title: Field - r748rwop
item.description: Rank write operations. Map: R748RANK Based on: R748RWOP Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748sbyt
item.description: On = Units of bytes indeterminable. Map: R748SIOL Based on: r748sflg Description Byte values incorrect. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748sflg.

item.title: Field - r748scbr
item.description: Synchronous I/O cache bytes read in units of 128K bytes. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCBR Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scbw
item.description: Synchronous I/O cache bytes written in units of 128K bytes. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCBW Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scro
item.description: Total number of synchronous I/O cache read operations. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCRO Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scrs
item.description: Number of successful synchronous I/O cache read operations. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCRS Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scrt
item.description: Synchronous I/O cache read accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCRT

item.title: Field - r748scwo
item.description: Total number of synchronous I/O cache write operations. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCWO Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scws
item.description: Number of successful synchronous I/O cache write operations. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCWS Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748scwt
item.description: Synchronous I/O cache write accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SCWT

item.title: Field - r748sflg
item.description: Flags Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SFLG Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748sbyt 0 On = Units of bytes indeterminable. r748stim 1 On = Units of time indeterminable.

item.title: Field - r748siid
item.description: Synchronous I/O link interface identifier. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SIID

item.title: Field - r748snbw
item.description: Synchronous I/O NVS bytes written in units of 128K bytes. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SNBW Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748snwo
item.description: Total number of synchronous I/O NVS write operations. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SNWO Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748snws
item.description: Number of successful synchronous I/O NVS write operations. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SNWS Description (long floating point)

item.title: Field - r748snwt
item.description: Synchronous I/O NVS write accumulated time in milliseconds (long floating point) Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SNWT

item.title: Field - r748sspd
item.description: Synchronous I/O link type. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SSPD Description 00 Not used 01 PCIe Gen 1 02 PCIe Gen 2 03 PCIe Gen 3 04 PCIe Gen 4 05-FF Not used

item.title: Field - r748sste
item.description: Synchronous I/O link type. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SSTE Description 00 Not used 01 Link not trained 02 Link handshake incomplete 03 Link handshake complete, link operational 04 Link in service mode 05-FF Not used

item.title: Field - r748stim
item.description: On = Units of time indeterminable. Map: R748SIOL Based on: r748sflg Description Time values incorrect. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r748sflg.

item.title: Field - r748styp
item.description: Synchronous I/O link type. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748STYP Description 00 Not used 01 Optical PCIe 02-FF Not used

item.title: Field - r748swdh
item.description: Synchronous I/O link width. Map: R748SIOL Based on: R748SWDH Description This is the number of PCIe lanes.

item.title: Field - r748xpid
item.description: Extent pool identifier Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XPID

item.title: Field - r748xplt
item.description: Extent pool type 00-03 = RESERVED, 04 = FB 1Gb, 05-131 = RESERVED, 132 = CKD 1Gb, 133-255 = RESERVED Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XPLT

item.title: Field - r748xptq
item.description: Extent pool type qualifier Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XPTQ Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r748xtcr 0 ‘1’ = Data encrpted extent pool

item.title: Field - r748xrcp
item.description: Real extent pool capacity in GB Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XRCP

item.title: Field - r748xrna
item.description: Number of real allocated extents in extent pool Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XRNA

item.title: Field - r748xrns
item.description: Number of real extents in extent pool Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XRNS

item.title: Field - r748xrsc
item.description: Real extent conversions. Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XRSC Description Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xsdy
item.description: Number of extents that were sources of dynamic extent relocations. Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XSDY Description Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xtcr
item.description: ‘1’ = Data encrpted extent pool Map: R748EXTP Based on: r748xptq Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r748xptq.

item.title: Field - r748xtdy
item.description: Number of extents that were targets of dynamic extent relocations. Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XTDY Description Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xvcp
item.description: Virtual extent pool capacity in GB. Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XVCP Description Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xvns
item.description: Number of virtual extents in extent pool. Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XVNS Description Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - r748xvsc
item.description: Virtual extent conversions. Map: R748EXTP Based on: R748XVSC Description Valid if bit R748CXVL is set

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAL Description Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAN Description This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74RAO

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Map: SMF74PRO Based on: fla Description Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74RTY

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SAM

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74SEG

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74SID

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SNM

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SRL

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74SSI

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74STY

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74SYN

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF74S8 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TOD RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74TME

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF74S8 Based on: SMF74TRN

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF74S8 Based on: flg Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF74PRO Based on: SMF74XNM
